text: (tavat movungē upamāva nam): ek ṣeyitān kenekugē upamāvaṭa sama vannēya. ohu minisāṭa “oba (allāhvada, ohugē dūtayāvada) pratikṣēpa kara damanu” yayi pævasuvēya. esēma ohuda pratikṣēpa kara dæmuvēya. (pasuva ṣeyitān ohuṭa) “niyata vaśayenma mā obagen ǣt vūvemi. mandayat lōkayanhi deviyan vana allāhṭa ættenma mā biya vannemi” yayi pævasuvēya
